page.title: 14Playground Games
page.content: These are the games we play in our Playground:Hide and Seek,Allie Allie O,Bluebell Windows,My Red Letter,Tag, Higher and Higher,Sting ball,Football, British Bulldogs,Catch it drop it, Stuck in the Mud,Rebound,Touch Rugby, Chaintag,Netball,Rounders,Hopscotch, Tennis,Skipping,Cricket,One Knee, Volleyball,Mary goes a Weeping,Farmers in the Den,Oranges and Lemons,Hokey Cokey,Three ball,Two ball,and Polo. {Hide and seek-}someone stands still and counts and the other people hide. When counting is finished he will try to find them.{Touch Rugby}is played with two teams. You have to try and touch your opponent and then they will give the ball to your side.{Volleyball is played with two teams.In the middle there is a net and you have to hit the ball over the net.The ball must not touch the floor.
